DOC.brief_summary: Local, prospective, multicenter, non-comparative, non-interventional, observational study. It is planed to assess compliance of patients with PH (pulmonary hypertension) with the physician's recommendation in real practice.
DOC.brief_title: Non-interventional Study on Compliance of Inhaled Treatment With Ventavis in Patient With Pulmonary Hypertension
